comment.body:
Great !!
nofish , could you make editable the right column of the blogs , embedded serch with indexing in alphabetical order the post is possible ?
thanks for your valuable job.

I have problem with Zerotalk...

Server error
Err: DatabaseError: database disk image is malformed in UiServer.py line 95 > UiRequest.py line 130 > MutePlugin.py line 153 > UiRequest.py line 293 > SiteManagerPlugin.py line 64 > SiteManager.py line 149 > Site.py line 58 > ContentManager.py line 43 > ContentManager.py line 276 > ContentDb.py line 119 > Db.py line 81 > DbCursor.py line 71

for zerotalk: Err: DatabaseError: database disk image is malformed  the sidebar is not present , only fullscreen error page

UiWebsocket.py line 81 > UiWebsocket.py line 254 > SidebarPlugin.py line 452 > SidebarPlugin.py line 148 > ContentManager.py line 286 > ContentDbDict.py line 55 > ContentDbDict.py line 28
also the sidebar is not present

I have also error for zerohello stats:
"Internal error: AttributeError: 'bool' object has no attribute 'get'
UiWebsocket.py line 81 > UiWebsocket.py line 254 > UiWebsocketPlugin.py line 134 > UiWebsocketPlugin.py line 47"

seems last update have broken zeronet installation  :(

ok , It' work now ! thanks nofish.

I have benchmarked the system:
